name: Memories within 5 mins game
description: This is for the 5 minutes game jam. It's a battle between 2 character of The memories within, Nyx and Lili. I had fun doing this so I hope you'll have fun watching it. This is more a video then a game since it's an auto battle. You don't have to push any button except the start button. Do not prepare the pop corn because it's only a 2 minutes video. ;)
